name: licenses_read
description:
Retrieves the details of a license.
#### Returns
Returns a JSON object with a `data` key containing the representation of the requested license, if the request is successful.

If the request is unsuccessful, an `errors` key containing information about the failure will be returned. Refer to the [list of error codes](#tag/Errors-and-Error-Codes) to understand why this request may have failed.

license_id.description: The unique identifier of the license.

$ul: **required_fields**: Fields required for this license (provided to help front-end validators). Maps to properties on the NodeLicense model.
**links**: URLs to alternative representations of the license.
**self**: A link to the detail page for the license.
**type**: The type identifier of the license (`license`).
